lessons.japanese: この黒板は黒でなく緑だ。
lessons.english: This blackboard is not black, but green.

lessons.japanese: このチョークを持って、黒板に書きなさい。
lessons.english: Take this piece of chalk and write on the blackboard.

lessons.japanese: アンは黒板に何か書いた。
lessons.english: Ann wrote something on the blackboard.

lessons.japanese: 先生は自分の名前を黒板に書いた。
lessons.english: The teacher wrote his name on the blackboard.

lessons.japanese: 先生は黒板のほうを指さしました。
lessons.english: The teacher pointed to the blackboard.

lessons.japanese: 先生は黒板に英語の文を書いた。
lessons.english: The teacher wrote English sentences on the blackboard.

lessons.japanese: 先生は黒板にフランス語の単語を書いた。
lessons.english: The teacher wrote French words on the blackboard.
